Chapter 3109: Preparing To Counterattack

Chapter 3109: Preparing to counterattack

“I’ve contacted a senior expert. He’ll be here soon, but we have to avoid the pursuit of those black-robed men of sacrifice before he arrives!”

Lu Ming said.

Wu Shan and Han Ying nodded as they looked forward.

Countless meteorites were floating in the space in front of them.

Countless meteorites of different sizes were floating in the universe. It was a vast and boundless region.

In the distant past, this must have been a tragic battlefield. Many planets were destroyed, forming countless meteorites that floated in the universe.

Their target was this area.

This area was extremely complex, with countless meteorites in a chaotic mess. They were going to use this terrain to avoid the enemy’s pursuit and hold on until the bone demon arrived.

“Let’s go!”

.com

go! Lu Ming shouted. The three of them flew forward and into the group of meteorites.

Soon, they disappeared into the meteorites.

……

When Lu Ming and the rest were escaping, sikong family of nine absolute Heavenly King mansion!

In a hidden Hall, a black-robed man was reporting to a middle-aged man.

This middle-aged man was the current master of the sikong family, sikong Nan.

Bang!

Sikong Nan smacked the chair handle, his body emitting a terrifying aura.

what a bunch of trash. You can’t even wipe out a small force like chutian star field. Why should I keep you? ”

Sikong Nan’s cold voice sounded out, making that black-robed person’s entire body tremble.

“Master, according to a reliable source, the young lady of the Han family was saved by Lu Ming!”

The black-robed man said.

it’s Lu Ming again. That little b * stard. He keeps ruining my plans. He’s really courting death!

“Go, send out more experts. We must kill them. Our information absolutely can not be leaked out!” Sikong Nan shouted coldly.

“Yes, this subordinate will do it now. We will definitely send our strongest experts!“

The black-robed man nodded repeatedly, then turned around and left.

no, I’m still worried. I have to make sure that everything goes well. I’ll go there myself!

Sikong Nan muttered. Then, his figure flashed and he left.

……

Chu Tian Star Domain!

More than an hour after Lu Ming and the other two entered the group of meteorites, many figures appeared outside the group of meteorites.

All of them were black-robed men. There were dozens of them and they were all experts. Even the weakest among them was at the divine King realm.

the target is in this group of meteorites!

One of the black-robed men said.

“Hmph, are they trying to use this asteroid field to play hide-and-seek with us? What a joke. Let’s split up and go in to search for them. Let’s see where they can hide. Once we have news, immediately inform the others!”

A powerful black-robed man said.

Immediately, dozens of black-robed men scattered into groups of three to five and flew into the meteorites.

After Lu Ming, Wu Shan, and Han Ying flew into the meteorites, they did not stop at one spot. After stopping on one meteorites for a while, they immediately moved to another meteorites to disrupt the other party’s search.

Just like that, they went around in circles among the meteorites for three days.

“Who is it?”

Suddenly, Lu Ming shouted coldly in one direction.

“Kid, your spiritual sense is quite sharp.”

A chuckling voice was heard. Then, a burly Man in Black appeared in front of them.

Seeing the Man in Black, Wu Shan and Han Ying’s expressions changed. They tensed up and got ready for battle.

However, Lu Ming smiled and said, ” “Senior bone demon, you’ve finally come!”

The speed of the bone demon was truly astonishing. It had only been three days, and it had already arrived here from the Qin heaven Starfield.

Upon hearing Lu Ming’s words, Wu Shan and Han Ying heaved a long sigh of relief. They knew that the ‘senior’ that Lu Ming mentioned had arrived!

“Lu Ming, you guys are in such a sorry state!”

Bone said with a smile.

“Senior bone demon, please don’t mock me. By the way, did you see any black-robed men when you came in?”

Lu Ming asked.

“Yes, there are dozens of people, many of whom are experts. They are looking for you all!”

Bone said.

“Very good. Now, let’s capture them all in one fell swoop!”

Lu Ming’s eyes flickered with killing intent.

After being chased for so long, he had a stomach full of pent-up anger, and now it was time to fight back.

“Lu Ming, what do you plan to do?”

Bone laughed.

“Of course it’s to lure them into the trap!”

Lu Ming smiled faintly.

Then, they stopped running and instead rushed back in the direction they had come from.

Not long after …

Buzzzzzz! Buzzzzzz! &Nbsp; Whoosh!…

In a flash, five to six black-robed men surrounded Lu Ming and the rest.

“Kid, let’s see how you’re going to escape!”

One of the black-robed men spoke ferociously, his killing intent as cold as a blade.

They glanced at bone demon, but he had concealed his aura. With their cultivation, they couldn’t see through his strength, so they didn’t put him in their eyes.

“Escape? why should I escape?”

Lu Ming sneered.

“Not escaping? You know you can’t escape!”

One of the black-robed men sneered.

The black-robed men were not in a hurry to attack. They were still a little apprehensive about Lu Ming and the others. They were still short of manpower. If Lu Ming and the others went all out, they would most likely suffer losses.

Now that they had the upper hand and they had already sent a voice transmission to the others, they would be here soon. By then, it would be easy for them to deal with Lu Ming and the rest.

Since the black-robed man did not make a move, Lu Ming and the rest naturally did not make a move either.

Lu Ming was also waiting. He was waiting for the black-robed men to gather together and capture them all in one fell swoop.

Wu Shan and Han Ying were worried.

After all, they did not know the strength of the bone demon. However, seeing Lu Ming’s calm expression, they could only brace themselves and wait.

The few black-robed men felt a little strange. Why did Lu Ming and the rest not break out of the encirclement?

If they didn’t break out now, wouldn’t they have even less of a chance when they had more people?

“Hmph, I don’t care what tricks you’re playing. In the face of absolute power, it’s still a dead end!”

Some of the black-robed men thought to themselves.

As expected, not long after, black-robed figures flickered and gathered from all directions.

Dozens of black-robed men surrounded Lu Ming and the rest in the middle.

“Why aren’t you doing anything? kill them!”

One of the black-robed men behind him said coldly and slashed at Lu Ming.

This person’s cultivation was terrifyingly strong and his aura was violent. Lu Ming felt that his body was locked and he could not move.

The black-robed man’s cultivation was definitely at the fifth level of Godking realm or higher.

It was a good thing that they had not met this person before. Otherwise, they would definitely not be able to escape.

But now …

The bone demon stepped forward and came before Lu Ming. Then, it stretched out a palm and made a grabbing motion.

Suddenly, a huge Dragon Claw appeared in the air and grabbed at the black-robed man. The knife light shattered like paper. The Dragon Claw didn’t stop and grabbed the black-robed man.

“Ah!”

The black-robed man shouted in disbelief.
